list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: update API configuration to support Oracle Cloud backend
- Change production URL from https://api.muscledia.com to http://89.168.117.65 - Add ENVIRONMENT property to API_CONFIG for environment tracking - Add console logging for API URL debugging - Improve fallback logic comments for clarity - Support dynamic environment switching via EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL

task.summary: Default task

fix(config): update API base URL for Android emulator networking
- Change from 0.0.0.0:8080 to 10.0.2.2:8080 for Android emulator - Add dynamic IP selection based on platform - Support both development and production environments"

fix(api): handle ApiResponse wrapper and improve error handling
- Fix baseURL reference to use dynamic API_CONFIG.BASE_URL - Add enhanced request/response logging for debugging - Improve ApiResponse<T> wrapper handling - Add proper timeout and error handling

feat(auth): implement backend JWT authentication service
- Replace local storage auth with Spring Boot API integration - Add proper LoginResponse and User type handling - Implement JWT token storage and management - Add username-based login (replacing email validation) - Include comprehensive error handling and debugging

fix(auth): update login form to use username instead of email
- Change email field to username field with User icon - Remove email validation for username input - Add dev-only test credentials auto-fill - Improve error handling and user feedback

refactor(auth): replace local auth with backend API integration
- Remove AsyncStorage-based authentication system - Integrate with backend AuthService for login/register - Add proper User and LoginResponse state management - Handle JWT tokens and user sessions - Add backend response format compatibility

deps: update dependencies for backend authentication
- Update axios and related networking dependencies - Ensure compatibility with React Native and Expo - Lock dependency versions for stable authentication flow

feat: implement enriched routine folder API integration" -m "Add support for single-call routine folder endpoints that return complete workout plan details with exercises." -m "Changes: - Add enriched routine folder endpoints (public/{id}, personal) - Create WorkoutPlanCard component with Hevy-style exercise previews - Create PlannedExerciseCard for workout plan exercise display - Update RoutineService to normalize enriched API responses - Add proper type definitions for PlannedExercise and WorkoutPlan - Update routine detail screen to use embedded workout plan data - Fix type compatibility between Exercise and PlannedExercise

feat(home): add collapsible routine folders and workout cards
- Implement expandable/collapsible routine folder sections - Display all workout plans within each folder - Add professional icons replacing emojis - Add folder options menu with remove functionality - Include Start Workout button on workout plan cards - Support both card click (details) and button click (start)

feat(workouts): add workout plan detail screen
- Create Hevy-style workout plan detail view - Display workout stats (duration, exercises, sets) - Show exercise list with sets, reps, and rest timers - Add Start Routine button - Include share and edit options - Show username instead of user ID

feat(workouts): implement workout session tracking screen
- Create exercise-by-exercise workout flow - Add set logging with weight and reps inputs - Implement completion checkboxes for sets - Add rest timer modal - Include progress bar and navigation - Support warmup, normal, and failure set types

fix(services): handle multiple response formats in savePublicRoutine
- Support both wrapped and direct response formats - Add fallback mechanism for 404/405 errors - Improve error handling and logging - Maintain backward compatibility

feat(workouts): add workout plan detail screen with exercise breakdown
- Create Hevy-style workout plan detail view with stats - Display duration, exercise count, and total sets - Show complete exercise list with sets and rep ranges - Add Start Routine button with navigation to session - Include share and edit options in header - Display creator username instead of user ID - Add exercise cards with rest timers and notes - Support warmup sets and rep ranges display
feat(routines): add public routine detail screen
chore: update IDE workspace configuration
chore: update IDE workspace configuration

feat(workout-session): add rest timers, warmup controls, and cancel button
- Implement adjustable rest timer (1-5 min) with modal settings per exercise - Add warmup timer with play/pause/reset functionality - Add cancel workout button at bottom with confirmation - Fix workout duration to use local time and format with hours - Add rest timer countdown modal with +15/-15 second adjustments - Improve timer state management with separate refs for each timer type

feat(services): add personalRecords field to WorkoutSet type
- Add personalRecords?: string[] field to WorkoutSet interface - Enable PR type tracking for individual sets - Support backend PR detection response structure

feat(components): add PR badges and improved timer controls
- Display gold PR badge with Award icon on sets achieving personal records - Add rest timer settings button with modal - Implement warmup timer controls (play/pause/reset) - Show PR types (MAX_WEIGHT, MAX_REPS, etc.) on set rows - Improve timer display and active state indicators

feat(workout): add PR badges and timer controls to session screens
Files: - app/workout-session/[planId].tsx - app/workout-plan-detail/[planId].tsx - components/workout/SetRow.tsx
Changes: - Display gold PR badge with Award icon on sets achieving personal records - Add rest timer settings button with modal - Implement warmup timer controls (play/pause/reset) - Show PR types (MAX_WEIGHT, MAX_REPS, MAX_VOLUME) on set rows - Improve timer display and active state indicators

feat(workout-plans): enhance exercise management interfaces
Files: - app/workout-plans/[planId]/add-exercise.tsx - app/workout-session/add-exercise.tsx - app/workout-plans/create.tsx - app/workout-plans/[planId]/edit.tsx
Changes: - Improve exercise selection and configuration flow - Update add-exercise screens for both plans and sessions - Enhance workout plan creation and editing views - Add better exercise filtering and search

feat(services): update workout services with PR detection and timer features
Files: - services/WorkoutService.ts - services/WorkoutPlanService.ts - services/index.ts
Changes: - Integrate PR detection logic in workout service - Add timer control service methods - Update workout plan service with new features - Export new service methods

feat(types): add types for PR badges and timer controls
Files: - types/workout.types.ts - types/api.ts
Changes: - Add PersonalRecord types and interfaces - Define timer control types - Update workout session types - Add API response types for new features

docs: delete architecture and integration documentation
Files: - docs/ARCHITECTURE.md - docs/BACKEND_API.md - docs/INTEGRATION.md - docs/SAVE_ROUTINE_FEATURE.md
Changes: - Document new PR badge feature architecture - Add timer controls API documentation - Update integration guide with new features - Document save routine feature workflow

docs: delete architecture and integration documentation feat: enhance workout session management and UI polish
- Backend: Added granular exercise calculation methods to WorkoutCalculationService. - Backend: Implemented updateExerciseInWorkout and removeExerciseFromWorkout in WorkoutService to support session editing. - Backend: Fixed compilation errors in WorkoutMapper by linking to new calculation service methods. - Frontend: Refactored Edit Routine screen to match Hevy-inspired design with dark mode support. - Frontend: Fixed SafeAreaView deprecation warnings by migrating to react-native-safe-area-context. - Frontend: Implemented optimistic updates for renaming folders and removing plans to eliminate UI lag. Files: - docs/ARCHITECTURE.md - docs/BACKEND_API.md - docs/INTEGRATION.md - docs/SAVE_ROUTINE_FEATURE.md
Changes: - Document new PR badge feature architecture - Add timer controls API documentation - Update integration guide with new features - Document save routine feature workflow

docs: delete architecture and integration documentation feat: enhance workout session management and UI polish
- Backend: Added granular exercise calculation methods to WorkoutCalculationService. - Backend: Implemented updateExerciseInWorkout and removeExerciseFromWorkout in WorkoutService to support session editing. - Backend: Fixed compilation errors in WorkoutMapper by linking to new calculation service methods. - Frontend: Refactored Edit Routine screen to match Hevy-inspired design with dark mode support. - Frontend: Fixed SafeAreaView deprecation warnings by migrating to react-native-safe-area-context. - Frontend: Implemented optimistic updates for renaming folders and removing plans to eliminate UI lag. Files: - docs/ARCHITECTURE.md - docs/BACKEND_API.md - docs/INTEGRATION.md - docs/SAVE_ROUTINE_FEATURE.md
Changes: - Document new PR badge feature architecture - Add timer controls API documentation - Update integration guide with new features - Document save routine feature workflow

fix: resolve setIdx error and optimize set type toggling
- Fix 'Property setIdx doesn't exist' error (setIdx → setIndex) - Implement local-first set type toggling with optimistic updates - Remove unnecessary API calls for set type changes - Update getLocalSetKey to use correct parameter name - Improve set type persistence with localStorage
Fixes crash when toggling set types during active workout sessions

fix: resolve setIdx error and optimize set type toggling
- Fix 'Property setIdx doesn't exist' error (setIdx → setIndex) - Implement local-first set type toggling with optimistic updates - Remove unnecessary API calls for set type changes - Update getLocalSetKey to use correct parameter name - Improve set type persistence with localStorage
Fixes crash when toggling set types during active workout sessions

refactor: improve workout plan detail screen state management
- Add proper state initialization from route params - Enhance plan data loading and error handling - Update navigation hooks for better UX

fix: add missing variable declarations in exercise browser
- Extract targetPlanId and currentWorkoutId from params - Add helper functions for difficulty and category mapping - Implement proper field mapping for session vs plan contexts - Add formatInstructions utility for array-to-string conversion
Resolves TS2304 errors: Cannot find name 'targetPlanId' and 'currentWorkoutId'

feat: enhance exercise browser with filter support
- Implement exercise filtering by difficulty, equipment, and muscle group - Add filter state management with param-based updates - Improve search functionality across multiple exercise fields

refactor: update workout plan editor with proper navigation
- Fix navigation state handling - Update plan editing workflows

feat: add routine detail screen with workout plan management
- Implement routine folder detail view - Add workout plan listing and navigation - Handle public vs personal routine folders

fix: add complete exercise metadata to workout plan requests
- Include bodyPart, equipment, targetMuscle fields in PlannedExercise - Add difficulty and category enum mapping - Format instructions array to string for backend compatibility - Update set structure to match PlannedSet schema
Resolves 400 validation errors when adding exercises to plans

fix: correct exercise payload structure for workout sessions
- Use exerciseId/exerciseName instead of exerciseTemplateId/title - Add primaryMuscleGroup and exerciseCategory fields - Include complete exercise metadata in session requests - Fix set structure for WorkoutSet schema
Resolves 400 errors when adding exercises to active workout sessions

feat: add comprehensive type definitions for exercise operations
- Add AddExerciseToWorkoutPlanRequest interface - Add AddExerciseToWorkoutSessionRequest interface - Update PlannedExercise with metadata fields - Update WorkoutExercise with denormalized properties - Add proper set type definitions for both contexts

fix(workout-plans): resolve 400 error when adding exercises
- Convert instructions from string to array format (backend expects List<String>) - Add formatInstructionsArray helper to properly split instructions - Remove null values from payload before sending to prevent deserialization errors - Update workoutPlanService to pass ALL metadata fields (bodyPart, equipment, targetMuscle, etc.) - Ensure PlannedSet structure matches backend (no restSeconds at set level)
Fixes: 400 BAD_REQUEST "Failed to read HTTP message" Files: browse.tsx, workoutPlanService.ts

chore(types): add comprehensive type definitions for exercise operations
- Add AddExerciseToWorkoutPlanRequest interface with all metadata fields - Add AddExerciseToWorkoutSessionRequest interface for active workouts - Update PlannedSet to remove restSeconds (exercise-level only) - Add ApiError interface for error handling - Document field differences between workout plans and sessions
Files: api.ts

feat(exercises): enhance exercise browser with proper field mapping
- Add removeNullValues helper to clean payloads - Implement formatInstructionsArray for proper backend compatibility - Add mapDifficulty and mapCategory helpers for enum validation - Extract targetPlanId and currentWorkoutId from route params - Add comprehensive metadata field support (bodyPart, equipment, targetMuscle)
Files: ExerciseBrowser.tsx, browse.tsx

refactor(workouts): standardize exercise addition for active sessions
- Implement WorkoutSet structure with session-specific fields - Add proper field mapping for exerciseId, exerciseName, primaryMuscleGroup - Include restSeconds at set level (different from workout plans) - Add completed flag initialization for new sets
Files: [planId].tsx (workout-session), add-exercise.tsx (workout-session)

chore(navigation): update tab navigation and index files
- Update index.tsx with proper navigation structure - Add route parameter handling for planId and sessionId
Files: index.tsx

fix: resolve exercise addition errors and improve type safety
Core Changes: - Fix 400 error when adding exercises to workout plans - Convert instructions format from string to array (List<String>) - Remove null values from payloads to prevent deserialization errors - Pass all metadata fields through service layer
Type System: - Add comprehensive type definitions for exercise operations - Update PlannedSet structure (remove set-level restSeconds) - Add AddExerciseToWorkoutPlanRequest interface - Add AddExerciseToWorkoutSessionRequest interface - Document field differences between plans and sessions
Field Mapping: - Workout Plans: exerciseTemplateId, title, instructions (array) - Workout Sessions: exerciseId, exerciseName, primaryMuscleGroup - Add metadata fields: bodyPart, equipment, targetMuscle, difficulty, category
Improvements: - Add formatInstructionsArray helper - Add removeNullValues helper for payload cleaning - Add mapDifficulty and mapCategory enum validators - Enhance error handling and logging
Fixes: - 400 BAD_REQUEST "Failed to read HTTP message" - Missing metadata fields in workout plan exercises - Type mismatches between frontend and backend
Files: browse.tsx, workoutPlanService.ts, api.ts, ExerciseBrowser.tsx, [planId].tsx (multiple), add-exercise.tsx (multiple), exercise-filters.tsx

chore: update .gitignore for environment files
- Exclude .env.development from version control - Exclude .env.staging from version control - Exclude .env.production from version control - Prevent sensitive environment variables from being committed

feat: add environment configuration files
- Create .env.development for local development - Create .env.staging for staging environment - Create .env.production for production Oracle Cloud backend - Support EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL and EXPO_PUBLIC_ENV variables

feat: update API configuration to support Oracle Cloud backend
- Change production URL from https://api.muscledia.com to http://89.168.117.65 - Add ENVIRONMENT property to API_CONFIG for environment tracking - Add console logging for API URL debugging - Improve fallback logic comments for clarity - Support dynamic environment switching via EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL

feat: update API configuration to support Oracle Cloud backend
- Change production URL from https://api.muscledia.com to http://89.168.117.65 - Add ENVIRONMENT property to API_CONFIG for environment tracking - Add console logging for API URL debugging - Improve fallback logic comments for clarity - Support dynamic environment switching via EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL

docs: delete architecture and integration documentation feat: enhance workout session management and UI polish
- Backend: Added granular exercise calculation methods to WorkoutCalculationService. - Backend: Implemented updateExerciseInWorkout and removeExerciseFromWorkout in WorkoutService to support session editing. - Backend: Fixed compilation errors in WorkoutMapper by linking to new calculation service methods. - Frontend: Refactored Edit Routine screen to match Hevy-inspired design with dark mode support. - Frontend: Fixed SafeAreaView deprecation warnings by migrating to react-native-safe-area-context. - Frontend: Implemented optimistic updates for renaming folders and removing plans to eliminate UI lag. - Extract targetPlanId and currentWorkoutId from params - Add helper functions for difficulty and category mapping - Implement proper field mapping for session vs plan contexts - Add formatInstructions utility for array-to-string conversion

- Use exerciseId/exerciseName instead of exerciseTemplateId/title - Add primaryMuscleGroup and exerciseCategory fields - Include complete exercise metadata in session requests - Fix set structure for WorkoutSet schema

- Add AddExerciseToWorkoutPlanRequest interface - Add AddExerciseToWorkoutSessionRequest interface - Update PlannedExercise with metadata fields - Update WorkoutExercise with denormalized properties - Add proper set type definitions for both contexts

- Convert instructions from string to array format (backend expects List<String>) - Add formatInstructionsArray helper to properly split instructions - Remove null values from payload before sending to prevent deserialization errors - Update workoutPlanService to pass ALL metadata fields (bodyPart, equipment, targetMuscle, etc.) - Ensure PlannedSet structure matches backend (no restSeconds at set level)

- Add AddExerciseToWorkoutPlanRequest interface with all metadata fields - Add AddExerciseToWorkoutSessionRequest interface for active workouts - Update PlannedSet to remove restSeconds (exercise-level only) - Add ApiError interface for error handling - Document field differences between workout plans and sessions

feat(exercises): enhance exercise browser with proper field mapping
- Add removeNullValues helper to clean payloads - Implement formatInstructionsArray for proper backend compatibility - Add mapDifficulty and mapCategory helpers for enum validation - Extract targetPlanId and currentWorkoutId from route params - Add comprehensive metadata field support (bodyPart, equipment, targetMuscle)

refactor(workouts): standardize exercise addition for active sessions
- Implement WorkoutSet structure with session-specific fields - Add proper field mapping for exerciseId, exerciseName, primaryMuscleGroup - Include restSeconds at set level (different from workout plans) - Add completed flag initialization for new sets

fix: resolve exercise addition errors and improve type safety
Core Changes: - Fix 400 error when adding exercises to workout plans - Convert instructions format from string to array (List<String>) - Remove null values from payloads to prevent deserialization errors - Pass all metadata fields through service layer
Type System: - Add comprehensive type definitions for exercise operations - Update PlannedSet structure (remove set-level restSeconds) - Add AddExerciseToWorkoutPlanRequest interface - Add AddExerciseToWorkoutSessionRequest interface - Document field differences between plans and sessions
Field Mapping: - Workout Plans: exerciseTemplateId, title, instructions (array) - Workout Sessions: exerciseId, exerciseName, primaryMuscleGroup - Add metadata fields: bodyPart, equipment, targetMuscle, difficulty, category
Improvements: - Add formatInstructionsArray helper - Add removeNullValues helper for payload cleaning - Add mapDifficulty and mapCategory enum validators - Enhance error handling and logging
Fixes: - 400 BAD_REQUEST "Failed to read HTTP message" - Missing metadata fields in workout plan exercises - Type mismatches between frontend and backend
Files: browse.tsx, workoutPlanService.ts, api.ts, ExerciseBrowser.tsx, [planId].tsx (multiple), add-exercise.tsx (multiple), exercise-filters.tsx

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
feat: update API configuration to support Oracle Cloud backend
- Change production URL from https://api.muscledia.com to http://89.168.117.65 - Add ENVIRONMENT property to API_CONFIG for environment tracking - Add console logging for API URL debugging - Improve fallback logic comments for clarity - Support dynamic environment switching via EXPO_PUBLIC_API_URL
